name: Yellow - Fabric/textile embroidered and natural dyed mixed fibres bronze pendant and necklace
description:
Amélie

This pendant is made of only natural fibres that have been dyed with natural plants to obtain the range of colours. It has various silks, lace, wool and tulle. Glass and cooper beading. Bronze chain.

Dye used was Osage Orange

The osage tree was named after to Osage Indian tribe of Oklahoma, Texas and Arkansas. It is found throughout the south and central United States and it contains a yellow dye similar to Fustic and black oak that yields clear true yellows to soft yellow greens that have a high light and wash-fastness.

Natural dyes give us beauty from life that surround us. Using a unique dying process, I achieve rich, beautiful and colourfast colours that complement any mood. Keep in mind that these lively dyes may fade gently over time or in direct sunlight. Gently rub with a damp cloth to remove any stains.

I do custom orders, if you like the style but want different colours please contact me.

For more photos of my work please visit
www.katherinejcordero.com


Happy wandering...

name: Silver/Navy - Fabric/textile embroidered and natural dyed mixed fibres bronze pendant and necklace
description:
Édith

This pendant is made of only natural fibres that have been dyed with natural plants to obtain the range of colours. It has various silks, lace, wool and tulle. Glass and cooper beading. Bronze chain.

Dye used was Logwood chips

The heartwood of the logwood tree yields deep, rich red purples to orchid blues to grey lavender. It grows in Mexico, Central America, Colombia, Venezuela, Guyana and India. Known as the “spiny tree” by the Aztecs because of its thorny, contorted trunk, which they used as a weapon.

Natural dyes give us beauty from life that surround us. Using a unique dying process, I achieve rich, beautiful and colourfast colours that complement any mood. Keep in mind that these lively dyes may fade gently over time or in direct sunlight. Gently rub with a damp cloth to remove any stains.

I do custom orders, if you like the style but want different colours please contact me.

For more photos of my work please visit
www.katherinejcordero.com


Happy wandering...

name: Rust/Orange - Fabric/textile embroidered and natural dyed mixed fibres bronze pendant and necklace
description:
Charlotte

This pendant is made of only natural fibres that have been dyed with natural plants to obtain the range of colours. It has various silks, lace, wool and tulle. Glass and cooper beading. Bronze chain.

Dye used was Madder Root

One of the most traditional and oldest dyestuffs. It yields turkey reds, mulberry, orange-red, crimson, rust browns, and near black. The primary dye component is alizarin, which is found in the roots of several plants and trees. Madder grows wild throughout India, South East Asia, Turkey, Europe, South China, Australia and Japan. 


Natural dyes give us beauty from life that surround us. Using a unique dying process, I achieve rich, beautiful and colourfast colours that complement any mood. Keep in mind that these lively dyes may fade gently over time or in direct sunlight. Gently rub with a damp cloth to remove any stains.

I do custom orders, if you like the style but want different colours please contact me.

For more photos of my work please visit
www.katherinejcordero.com

name: Multicolour - Damask Wallpaper Hanging Panel Wall Art Graphics Edwardian Style Custom Print 2' x 12'
description:
Coeur Rustique

This delicate yet rustic and textured print will bring a splash of bright colours and detailed layers to any home.
The watercolour backdrop gives it a hand painted feel while making the top layers pop. 

Created in Photoshop and inspired by a handmade piece I made, I wanted this wallpaper to feel old and forgotten. At the same time, giving it a variation of bright colours and textures to modernize a traditional looking damask print.

You can use it as wallpaper and every roll measures 2' x 12'
or you can choose a smaller size of 2' x 6' and use it a an accent piece on any empty walls that need some decorative details.

I can do custom size for the length with a 2' width and if youre not sure of how many rolls you need, send me your wall measurements and I will help you out.

I do custom orders, if you like the style but want different colours please contact me.

For more photos of my work please visit
www.katherinejcordero.com

Happy wandering...
